text:
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
-2-
January 21, 1955
Within a few days a check in the amount of $1,500 will be
sent to Dr. Harry J. Skornia.
We trust that this grant is enabling the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters to offer a comprehensive personnel
service to the entire field of educational television and
radio*
Sincerely yours.
cc: Dr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director, HAEB
